systems.name: Server (Hono API)
systems.description: 27+ route files (v2 complete + audits). Hono framework, WebSocket + file watcher. Multi-project hot-swap. Docs generation pipeline (discovery + per-doc), headless AI runner, automation engine with audit recording, scheduler. Rate limiting (withRetry + TokenRateTracker). AI state cache. Multi-user data separation. Helicone enrichment. Build passes clean. Git clean (data files uncommitted is normal). Automation engine validated live (session-end-audit, change-tracker, weekly-report all successful). 0 open issues blocking server. Session 10: Massive expansion — docs system, rate limiting, state cache, multi-user prep.

systems.name: Web UI (React + Tailwind)
systems.description: 13+ views: Dashboard (v2 health ring), Roadmap (kanban DnD + By Epic view), Systems, Issues, Ideas, Codebase (react-flow), Sessions, Changelog, Docs (three-column with Mermaid + sub-pages + cost modal), Metrics, Settings (3-tab), Audits (full transparency). AI chat sidebar with AgentActivityPanel + SessionChangesTray. Notification tray. Project switcher. Lucide icons. Session 9: ISS-039 critical fix (refreshKey destroyed view state). Session 10: Three-column Docs UI, Mermaid rendering, progress tracking. UI stable and battle-tested. Phase 2 polish remains (spacing, typography, Linear-inspired density).

systems.name: AI Intelligence Layer
systems.description: AIService across OpenAI/Anthropic/Google with Helicone proxy. Auto-model-discovery (58 models). Task-aware ModelRouter with fallback chains. ~40 tools across 16 domains. ChatService with multi-turn agent loop. SSE streaming. User profiles injected. Headless runner for programmatic execution. AI state cache (~2-5K tokens replaces 130K raw). Rate limiting (withRetry + exponential backoff, TokenRateTracker with preemptive delay). Session 9: Chat agent validated (investigation + handoff pattern proven). Session 10: Docs generation system (discovery agent + per-doc writers + parallel execution + verification + recovery). ISS-040 resolved (rate limiting). Remaining risks: ISS-043 (prompt caching not working — 0 cache reads despite 130K prompts).

systems.name: CLI
systems.description: Full command set (init, start, status, backlog, issues, changelog, context, projects). Multi-project support. Pillar initialized successfully. NEVER fully tested against live server — fundamental risk. npm link crashes Cursor — must use 'npx tsx' workaround. No activity since Feb 7 (14+ days stale). Lowest confidence system. Needs live validation before dogfooding on other projects. Risk of silent failures when used for real. Blocks Landmark initialization test. WEEKLY REFRESH: 14+ days stale, health declining slowly.

systems.name: Data Layer (JSON + TypeScript)
systems.description: v2 entity model: 14 entities, ~500 lines shared types. Store reads from v2 paths with backward compat. File watcher syncs. JSON-based with typed interfaces. Data directories: roadmap/, systems/, releases/, activity/, labels/, automations/, docs/, issues/, ideas/, session/, brain/, ai/, metrics/, audits/. Migration script completed. Central registry at ~/.dev-track/. Most mature system. ISS-020 RESOLVED (sessions 6-7 backfilled). 20 modified data files uncommitted (normal session state). Audit system recording operational.

systems.name: Integration Plugins
systems.description: 8 plugins: GitHub (passing, last tested Feb 7), Vercel (unconfigured), Supabase (unconfigured), Sentry (unconfigured), Helicone (configured, status unknown — last test Feb 8 01:56 UTC showed FAILING, but enrichment working in session 10), Upstash (unconfigured), AWS EC2 (unconfigured), Cloudflare (unconfigured). 1/8 confirmed working. Helicone enrichment (custom properties) working despite test failure — may be test endpoint issue. ISS-003 still open (14+ days). Blocks full AI cost tracking for dogfooding. WEEKLY REFRESH: 14+ days stale, health declining slowly.

systems.name: Codebase Architecture Visualizer
systems.description: react-flow graph with 3 views (module, file, dependency). Plain-English module descriptions and relationship labels via generateModuleDescription()/generateEdgeLabel(). Rich detail panel. Scanner-generated descriptions from code analysis. ISS-007 resolved. Last scan Feb 8 04:19 UTC — reflects post-v2 codebase (96 files, 19K lines). Graph data is current but visualizer code unchanged since Feb 7. No known bugs but untested with latest scan data in browser.

systems.name: Codebase Scanner
systems.description: Generic module inference via directory analysis. generateModuleDescription() and generateEdgeLabel() for rich descriptions. Auto-discovery approach — no annotations needed. Last scan: Feb 8 04:19 UTC — current with post-v2 codebase (96 files, 19K lines, 11 modules). Scanner code itself unchanged since Feb 7. Functional but aging — no improvements or maintenance since initial build.

systems.name: AI Brain System
systems.description: AI memory system: 28 notes total (4 dismissed, 24 active). User preferences (4 prefs + 4 learned patterns). Context recovery (last refreshed Feb 9 00:27 UTC — current). User profiles with AI-observed intelligence scoring (IQ 128, cognitive + technical radar charts, deep assessment, session observations). BN-015 through BN-020 are large report summaries (bloat concern per BN-021). Active notes include critical architectural observations (BN-023, BN-027, BN-028). Health improved from 70% → 75% due to current context recovery and valuable active notes.

systems.name: Cursor Rule / AI Context
systems.description: alwaysApply frontmatter, mandatory pre/post checklist at top, inline Quick Status + Last Session Briefing (auto-regenerated), file map, session lifecycle instructions, AI autonomy permissions, standing instructions. ISS-006 (AI drift) partially resolved — automation engine provides structural enforcement. Context recovery refreshed Feb 9 during session 10. The rule itself is current with entity model v2. Needs validation in next real coding session but fundamentally sound. Health improved from 62% → 75% due to automation engine validation.

systems.name: Session Tracking & Velocity
systems.description: 10 sessions logged (includes 2 backfilled). 87 changelog entries. Velocity tracked: 128 items shipped, 421 points across 10 sessions. Avg 12.8 items/session, 42.1 pts/session. ISS-020 RESOLVED (sessions 6-7 backfilled). v2 unified Session type in use. Session 11 currently active (started Feb 9 07:00 UTC). Velocity data accurate and complete. Session 10 was biggest ever: 24 items, 80 points, ~18K lines. Health improved from 88% → 90%.
